summary.span: 提供 和 物件的列舉支援。

span.span: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型家族是一組具有相同的字樣，新細明體，例如而不同功能的字型。A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features. 這些功能差異包括，像是斜體、 和，例如粗體。These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![字型](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字型")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") "Times New Roman"字型家族成員的字體的範例Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members

summary.span: 從指定的字型位置傳回 物件的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of objects from a specified font location.
